resources.string:
What is this

This project emerged as a tea-timer is something I nearly use every day and the app I was using so far was not ideal to me. I used the only tea timer so far on FDroid which was working but visually not really pleasing and required more clicks than needed.

License

GPLv3 you can find the code on github

Contribute

If you know more good infusions and you can provide a nice image on a white background that is free to use - please send it to me! Also drop me a mail if you like to translate.

Image Attribution

for the Icon the following svg was the base: Teapot by Erin Agnoli on the Noun Project
